definitions: The action of lowering and raising one's head slightly and briefly, especially in greeting, assent, or understanding, or to give a signal.
The action of allowing one's head to fall forward when drowsy or asleep.
The action of bending or inclining the head or top part of something.
examples: She was nodding in agreement during the presentation.
He kept nodding off during the long lecture.
The flowers were nodding gently in the breeze.
